channel.title: Android SDK Tool on Paradoxical
channel.description: Recent content in Android SDK Tool on Paradoxical

item.title: AndroidSDK sdkmanager [sdkmanager 命令工具]
item.description: 在cmd窗口中设置临时javahome路径： set JAVA_HOME=WindowsPath sdkmanager工具路径 .\android-sdk-windows\tools\bin 帮助命令： sdkmanager –help // 查看命令帮助 下载地址(将https改为http,将dl-ssl改为dl) http://dl-ssl.google.com/android/repository/tools_r25.2.5-windows.zip 新建"SDK_ROOT"目录, cd SDK_ROOT\tools\bin sdkmanager –list 列出所有版本 sdkmanager “platform-tools” 生成包含相关工具的platform-tools目录 sdkmanager “platforms;android-25” 生成包含相关工具的platforms目录 sdkmanager “build-tools;25.0.0” 生成包含相关工具的build-tools目录 如果报一下错误， 确保jdk版本对应android sdk版本： Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: com/android/sdklib/tool/SdkManagerCli : Unsupported m ajor.minor version 52.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(ClassLoader.java:632) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:616) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:141) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:283) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(URLClassLoader.java:58) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:197) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: com.
